title: WCAS MATH 311-3-51 MENU:  Probability and Stochastic Processes

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Continuous time Markov processes, vector independence and the multivariate normal distribution, second-order and stationary processes, stochastic differential equations. The 311 sequence covers more topics at a faster pace and in greater depth than does 310; students may not receive credit for both 311-3 and 310-3.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
Introduction to Stochastic Processes with R
Robert P Dobrow
Wiley
ISBN: 978-1118740651?
